item.title: Visualizing Single-Cell Transcriptomics
item.description: Technical stories shouldnâ€™t get lost in technical detail. In these short yet scientifically rich videos, my task was to introduce a new and complex technology for three areas of advanced research - cancer, immunology, and neuroscience.

item.title: Cutting-Edge Life Science in VR
